about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the girls?!

Story Background

"Sex apartment" is well known in the city as a place where people can have casual sex without any strings attached, but there's something strange about room 606.
Those who enter claim to find themselves having passionate encounters with beautiful women each time they visit, only to find that they all look different...
What will happen there?

Characters

Yamano:

Yamano seems to be a resident of Room 606, but it also seems not. She has a face like a girl but at the same time has a mature body.

Kuroyuki:

Kuroyuki is also one of the residents of Room 606. In this mysterious room, she has an extraordinary sexual desire and will drain all the men who come into the room.

Yuri:

This person seems familiar, but no one knows her, she just has a familiar face. She is also one of the residents of Room 606. Like other girl, she will definitely satisfy you.

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may contain assault/non-consensual sex or BDSM content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
